snippet: As problems grow in Rio de Janeiro State seven months before it hosts the Olympics, its governor, Luiz Fernando de Souza, partly blames a painting that was in his office.
abstract: Gov Luiz Fernando de Souza of Rio de Janeiro State has attributed some of many problems in state, which include public health emergency in advance of Olympic Games, to negatived energy from painting in his office; de Souza has lifted veil on role superstition plays in Brazilian politics by doing so, and provided fodder for his opponents.
lead_paragraph: As problems grow in Rio de Janeiro State seven months before it hosts the Olympics, its governor, Luiz Fernando de Souza, partly blames a painting that was in his office.

headline.main: Cause of Crises? For Rio Governor, Life Incriminates Art
headline.print_headline: Cause of Crises? For Rio Governor, Life Incriminates Art
